text: If someone thinks that love and peace is a cliche that must have been left behind in the Sixties, that's his problem. Love and peace are eternal.
author: John Lennon

text: Be at war with your vices, at peace with your neighbors, and let every new year find you a better man.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: A mind at peace, a mind centered and not focused on harming others, is stronger than any physical force in the universe.
author: Wayne Dyer

text: If everyone demanded peace instead of another television set, then there'd be peace.
author: John Lennon

text: Each one has to find his peace from within. And peace to be real must be unaffected by outside circumstances.
author: Mahatma Gandhi
